name: UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility
desc: An enumeration that defines the visibility of list separators.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The collection view list section automatically determines the visibility of the separator.

items.name: static func == (UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility, UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two list separator visibility enumerations are equal.

items.name: static func != (UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility, UIListSeparatorConfiguration.Visibility) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two list separator visibility enumerations are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the list separator visibility enumeration by feeding them into the hasher.
